Astrum Solar <http://www.astrumsolar.com>
A Message from Our Partner Program
You are invited to join Astrum Solar's Partner Program.
Get rewarded for talking to your customers
The Astrum Solar Partners Program is a great way to add to your bottom line by participating in one of the hottest growth segments for home owners. Solar installations are skyrocketing with more solar installations in the US over the last 18 months than in the past 30 years. With no investment on your part, you can profit from that growth!
All you have to do is something you are already doing, talk to your customers and refer them to us. For every home owner you refer to us that completes a site survey, you get paid, and your cash bonus is even higher if they become one of our customers.
Make money by talking to your customers about solar
Earn $100/Qualified Lead*, $750/Sale No Fees to Join Online Landing Page Marketing Templates
As a partner with Astrum Solar, you will be working with one of the top ten solar installers in the US who has been recognized as one of the fastest growing companies by Inc. Magazine and has an A rating from the BBB. By helping your customers go solar, you help them save money, increase their home value, become more energy independent and contribute to a cleaner planet. These are benefits all of your customers will appreciate.
Questions? Email us at partners@astrumsolar.com <mailto:partners@astrumsolar.com>.
Interested? Become a Partner today! <http://www.astrumsolar.com/company/partner-programs>
See a Sunny Day in a Whole New Way Call Us: 800-903-6130 ext. 825
You are receiving this email because you could benefit from the Astrum Solar Partner Program.
* A qualified lead is when the referral prospect agrees to a roof evaluation (i.e. site survey) by Astrum Solar. A solar power system is customized for per home, so pricing, savings, utility bill and solar bill amounts and actual returns vary based on location, system size, available solar incentives and local utility rates. Financing terms vary by location and are not available in all areas.
